content.text: Match ends, Valencia 1, Chelsea 1.
Ashley Cole (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card.
Juan Mata (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card.
Second Half ends, Valencia 1, Chelsea 1.
Salomon Kalou (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Jordi Alba (Valencia).
Florent Malouda (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Jordi Alba (Valencia) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Florent Malouda (Chelsea).
Attempt saved. Nicolas Anelka (Chelsea) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Salomon Kalou.
Offside, Chelsea. David Luiz tries a through ball, but Salomon Kalou is caught offside.
Salomon Kalou (Chelsea) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Pablo Piatti (Valencia).
Goal!  Valencia 1, Chelsea 1. Roberto Soldado (Valencia) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Salomon Kalou (Chelsea) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
Penalty conceded by Salomon Kalou (Chelsea) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Corner,  Valencia. Conceded by Petr Cech.
